store_info.title: Pok√©mon GO
store_info.description:
Venusaur, Charizard, Blastoise, Pikachu, and many other Pok√©mon have been discovered on planet Earth!
Now‚Äôs your chance to discover and capture the Pok√©mon all around you‚Äîso get your shoes on, step outside, and explore the world. You‚Äôll join one of three teams and battle for the prestige and ownership of Gyms with your Pok√©mon at your side.

Pok√©mon are out there, and you need to find them. As you walk around a neighborhood, your smartphone will vibrate when there‚Äôs a Pok√©mon nearby. Take aim and throw a Pok√© Ball‚Ä¶ You‚Äôll have to stay alert, or it might get away!

Search far and wide for Pok√©mon and items
Certain Pok√©mon appear near their native environment‚Äîlook for Water-type Pok√©mon by lakes and oceans. Visit Pok√©Stops, found at interesting places like museums, art installations, historical markers, and monuments, to stock up on Pok√© Balls and helpful items.

Catching, hatching, evolving, and more
As you level up, you‚Äôll be able to catch more-powerful Pok√©mon to complete your Pok√©dex. You can add to your collection by hatching Pok√©mon Eggs based on the distances you walk. Help your Pok√©mon evolve by catching many of the same kind.

Take on Gym battles and defend your Gym
As your Charmander evolves to Charmeleon and then Charizard, you can battle together to defeat a Gym and assign your Pok√©mon to defend it against all comers.

It‚Äôs time to get moving‚Äîyour real-life adventures await!

Notes:

- This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. It is optimized for smartphones, not tablets.
- Compatible with Android devices that have 2GB RAM or more and have Android Version 4.4 - 6.0 installed.
- Compatibility is not guaranteed for devices without GPS capabilities or devices that are connected only to Wi-Fi networks
- Not compatible with Android devices that use Intel Atom processors.
- Compatibility with tablet devices is not guaranteed.
- Application may not run on certain devices even if they have compatible OS versions installed.
- It is recommended to play while connected to a network in order to obtain accurate location information.
- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.
- Please visit www.PokemonGO.com for additional compatibility information.
- Information current as of July 5, 2016
store_info.short_description: Step outside and catch Pok√©mon in the real world! Collect & battle with others.

reviews.title: It's alright
reviews.body: I gave it a five star rating mostly because I see a lot of low ratings under five star. This game is no less than five star. Just has a few bugs here and there, but isn't bad overall.

reviews.title: Really cool dev are working hard
reviews.body: I love this game and have not found any bugs yet would love to have a in game chat I ran into my first problem because the server is down I had my first bug and I reported it then they got back to me saying that they are trying to fix it that's a big plus in my books

reviews.title: Ehh, it's fun but glitchy
reviews.body: It really needs fixed as far as glitches. It freezes the phone when evolving sometimes. Many times right in the middle of catching a pokemon it freezes. It's fun tho when its working correctly.

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Active AT&T
reviews.body: Avatar doesn't move no matter how far I walk. Location turned on and allowed for Pok√©mon GO. Tried reinstalling 5 times, with no luck. Now the servers are down. I believe you guys released this game a little too soon, maybe you didn't expect it to be so popular. Get more servers, and work out some location bugs. Then I'll get to play and give you a real review.

When it does I will change my rating.

reviews.title: Is this really pokemon though?
reviews.body: Yes there are pokemon in the game. But I was expecting something like I don't know... battles!? Interactions with other players? You can't battle players or wild pokemon. Only through gyms can you battle other players. And it's not even a pokemon gym battle. It's like tackle and dodge and that's it

reviews.title: Wow...just wow

reviews.title: Pokemon Stay (Internet Required)
reviews.body: Wont load without an internet connection and wont function without continued access. Is not location based, i got to lvl 5 in a few hrs without leaving the house. I have not seen a single gym or poke stop in my area that isn't a church or a cross. Since churches in my area don't offer free WiFi I cannot unlock battles.

reviews.title: Buggy and was expecting features
reviews.body: -Bugs with pokedex not showing properly. -Bug with Pokemon not snowing up in AR mode. -Bug catching Pokemon and screen stuck looking at pokeball. Also was hoping to trade and battle with friends

Go to log on and all my earlier efforts have been erased and need to start over again. Wouldn't be a problem if i hadn't made purchases in the store already.. My User name is still in the system somewhere as I can't use it...

reviews.title: Cistomer service??? Whats that
reviews.body: Customer service is zero here...you send msg after msg but never get a reply back...they need some form of customer service with this game and a 24/7 live support...and also need to change their policy of if u get ur account deleted (so you can start the game again) that u can never use your email address for the game again...such a stoneage policy...until these things are changed my rating will stay at 1 star

reviews.title: Fix issues
reviews.body: I cant play this game yet, thebservers are always down. Idk why my friends can play with no issues. Im sure in a few weeks from now the IT team will have most issues fixed.

reviews.title: For LG G Pad

reviews.title: Can't start because ALL the names are taken
reviews.body: I can't even start because only one person can use a name and I only have so many names. I have gone through all the names I can think of and I still can't play. Change this, Nintendo!

reviews.title: Crash's too much
reviews.body: I walked 5 km to hatch an egg, just when it starts hatching the game freezes. I restarted  but I didn't get anything and the egg was gone. Is anything gonna be done about this? BTW I love the concept and I have been playing a lot, just need an update ASAP!

reviews.title: Android N not supported until officially released?
reviews.body: I'm no Android developer, but I seriously doubt the APIs are changing so much that I should only get a non responsive grey screen after the Niantic splash screen. Seems that Android N has been deliberately blocked from playing. After their history with Google, I am very surprised at this decision.

reviews.title: More
reviews.body: We want to battle others near by. We also want more stuff to do here in trotwood, ohio 45416. We also want beter servers. A buffer where if the servers do go down we dont have to reboot and lose the data we just collected.  Great game, to many beta bugs though

reviews.title: What Game?
reviews.body: You can't log in if you use a Pok√©mon Trainer Club account. I set it up and haven't been able to play since. Now all my friends are leagues ahead of me because they use Google and I'll never be able to play with them let alone catch up.

reviews.title: This game needs alottt of work
reviews.body: We should be abld to battle the pokemon. Poke center's and everything esle needs to be closer. Need to give away free pokeballs everyday when login. Lots more needs to be done check the comments.

reviews.title: GPs not found.

reviews.title: Suggestions
reviews.body: Instead of leaderboards, introduce a tournament twice a year where the top 5 winners are declared the elite 4 and the strongest is the champion and get some sort of bonus but nothing OP, it should be held at a global scale and require signing up, that way only serious trainers can compete without having easy wins against player's who aren't that serious about playing

reviews.title: NEVER Works
reviews.body: Either the servers are down or it won't load, I only get to play every 1 outta 25 times, it's complete trash immediate fix needed

reviews.title: Server issues
reviews.body: It's kind of comical that I get servers are down while standing next to my fianc√© who logged in just fine, and we're on the same carrier.

reviews.title: Dont waste your time!
reviews.body: Not pay to win, its pay to play! Also pokemon take to long to find. And some of the locations i was right there but they were in houses and it wasnt close enough so there was no way of getting there. It also said i had 7 ratata candies and i only needed 1 to level it up. But i wasnt able to upgrade it. Theres also no stats on pokemon or ways to see what u have.

reviews.title: Can't see off of actual camera
reviews.body: I have a galaxy grand prime and when I see a pokemon and push to catch it I can't use my actual camera I have to go into ar mode and I get "server errors" damn near every time I log in when and if that gets fixed I'll give it more stars
So I went biking so I could catch some pokemon but no pokemon appear and I came across a gym, and once I click on it, my screen has been loading ever since. It's still doing that right now

reviews.title: Server issues says it all
reviews.body: Fix this and your user base will flourish to the point where you can evolve your game into the Pokemon altered reality for which we all have been waiting.

reviews.title: Doesn't load
reviews.body: I downloaded this app twice on my S5 and I can't even get past the part where it asks you to sign in with Google or Pok√©mon club. When I try with Google it reboots the app, and the Pok√©mon club website is down... uninstalling this app. I was looking forward to this game too..

Keeps telling me gps signal not found. But my location is on.  and wont let me see the pokemon through my actual camera. I can see the pokemon in the game app but once the camera comes on nothing. My buddy downloaded the game and he can see with his camera. And i pressed allow on everything. Kinda annoying.

reviews.title: What the heck?
reviews.body: Used Pokemon Go for a while turned it off turned it back on and four hours on and it's been on the loading screen. I have both turned off my phone and restarted my phone still didn't work then I uninstall and reinstall still doesn't work won't log me in using my Google account. I'll give you 5 stars if it can be fixed.

reviews.title: It's in beta
reviews.body: I know it's in beta still but here in the USA the servers are constantly down and in stl mo particularly when it is working there are few Pok√©mon over all but in some areas it is a hot bed with op mon like a slow bro with 495 cp. Hope this helps chase the bugs

reviews.title: Only 2 Stars for me
reviews.body: If you want to play you have to have wifi/data. It would be 10 times better if you didn't have to have wifi or data. I suggest the creators try to come up with a way to make it wifi/data free.
To the developer's. I just purchase. A 0.99 coins pack and then the game shut down and i lost my coin pack i want a reason. Why and a refund olz and thank u
I've been waiting for this game for a long time, but it has a lot of issues. I can't find pokemon or other locations and the sounds goes away everytime I get a notification.

reviews.title: Flicking Simulator
reviews.body: Its just a re-skin of ingress. Theres no fighting of wild pokemon, Can't fight friends. Can't do anything except walk around and flick pokeballs

reviews.title: Waited so long for this game.
reviews.body: Wanted to play this game since hearing about it. Just wish it had trading , PvP, and wild Pokemon battles. Just like the older games. But it's sure to come in the updates.

Havent found any Pok√©mon yet besides the initial starters. Says it can't find my location but it sure knows where I am on the map.  I get it, Android is harder to develop for than iOS, but you could at least try to make it functional on release. Will change rating when I can actually use it, but I would wait until they resolve some issues before downloading

reviews.title: Not working at all
reviews.body: No matter what I change in my settings the app tells me my location can't be detected. I've moved inside, outside,  down the street and Nada still get the same error.

reviews.title: Won't open
reviews.body: Can't get past the opening screen, just goes blank and stays like that.  Looks like I'm not the only one, would be nice for them to address this soon.  Will re-rate after I can actually use it.  Nexus 6p-Android N

reviews.title: Doesn't work
reviews.body: It always tells me my GPS is not found or server error. I have only caught one Pokemon...... thanks a lot

reviews.title: People look at me weirdly
reviews.body: I'm just bicycling around and I would go a block, and stop, go a block and stop. I couldn't get the nerve go to the stop at the park, because there was some party there and it's really awkward.   Also, I see a pokemon and I try to catch it. Do I tap it, or get the pokeballs from the items bag?

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.body: I like pok√©mon. And this game made me like it even more. Only thing, the map could use detail. Like it could look like it is more pok√©mon like in the old games instead of a plain flat land. There could be grass, Houses, Trees, etc

reviews.title: Server issues
reviews.body: When I play the game it's takes forever to load and half the time I can't even log in because there are constant server problems. Also there is a huge lack of Pok√©mon.

reviews.title: Demands too much
reviews.body: You have to have the app open and active on your screen for it to track you before you can catch pokemon. I ride a bike 7 miles a day. For pokemon go to track me i can't listen to my music. Why can't i set where my home is and then go out?

reviews.title: Character creation
reviews.body: I can't name my character i tried some generic names and then just objects and things in different languages but it didn't let me do anything

If you can actually play and get passed the professor I MIGHT change the rating. It keeps on saying Onboard_avatar_already_set what does that mean??? Don't you test these apps out BEFORE you launch them you obviously missed something.

reviews.title: Not worth downloading
reviews.body: Never loads,  no pokestops work, I cant catch any pokemon because it freezes and there's basically nothing anywhere around me and I live right in the center of town.

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.body: I've been waiting for this game to come out. I like everything about this game. Wish I can battle trainers without going to a gym, But who know maybe in a later patch.

reviews.title: Still has issues..
reviews.body: It needs an option to exit the app. Right now I have to close it using my phone's "close active apps" interface. It also freezes, or says servers are down.

reviews.title: Needs stability, otherwise good
reviews.body: Not a particularly deep game so far but it's something to do while on a walk, assuming I won't need my phone the rest of the day. (unless I can plug in my phone right afterwards)
The farthest I have ever gonna was to where you give yourself a name but they would say it is invalid and my GPS doesn't connect and keeps crashing right before I load it up.

reviews.title: Location not detected
reviews.body: Im sure ive read a few comments which say the same thing. I use a S5 and i downloaded 2 days ago and i cant interact with anything as it kind find my location. Thought the game would have active updates because its new but no.

reviews.title: I like it....
reviews.body: But ar view don't work and idk how to really work it. It should have a tutorial for people over all good game just really need these two things fixed

reviews.title: Gps isnt working
reviews.body: I have 4glte and my gps location turned on. When i got to get on my avitar is like in a lake standing in one place and wont move. My gps works just fine on my maps but wont on the game. Please fix it

reviews.title: Servers
reviews.body: I can't blame them for under shooting the amount of players they thought would hop on and I am glad they released it now instead of waiting and adding things like battling. I can wait for further update.

reviews.title: No Pokemon within miles
reviews.body: I've played for 2 hours and I haven't seen anything at all. Without mentioning that I have to try to sign in 50 times before I can get into it. It's like a rip off on a normal GPS, except you get to have a starting Pokemon to see nothing in 3 cities.

reviews.title: Needs an update
reviews.body: This game really needs an update. All I am getting is a server when I try to login to Google and it continuously gives me an authentication error when I try to sign into the Pok√©mon Trainer Club. Please give the game an update and I will change my rating. Thanks for reading

reviews.title: PLEASE FIX
reviews.body: When I play there is literally almost nothing around me the gyms are really far away and so are the poke shops so I can't even get the bonuses, please just add more locations, it  would make this alot better.

reviews.title: It's ok
reviews.body: It's a pretty fun game. But I have this glitch where after I catch a Pokemon and I'm supposed to get 100 stardust it doesn't give it to me.

reviews.title: Buggy and Needs Impovemment
reviews.body: I'll give it a 5 if they stick with this and fix it. The AR mode keeps saying it can't identify my phones orientation. Also you can't battle or trade with friends and you level up by buying items via microtransactions instead of training. Still pretty fun though, when the servers are up.

reviews.title: Just keeps crashing
reviews.body: I can't even play the game because it keeps crashing        I'm using a Samsung galaxy tab 4 (was hoping it would work on a tablet since I don't have a phone)

reviews.title: Don't waste your time
reviews.body: Don't bother until the server issues are fixed (they decide to spend enough money.) This is a money printing machine with all the micro transactions, but they won't bother actually paying the money up front for people to be able to PLAY IT.

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.body: Works most the time, kinda boring unless you want to take a 10 mile walk while staring at your phone. Wish I could battle my friends.

reviews.title: Server issues
reviews.body: Just like most people, the server is horrible! I got as far as putting in my birthday and then nothing...would be great to be able to actually play! Fix the server and you'll get better ratings but for now, I don't see why anyone is excited about this...

reviews.title: So much for "worldwide release"
reviews.body: Thanks for not making this game available in my country fellas.                               Edit: You guys do realize that the 'server errors' means the game isn't available in your country. Stop trying.

reviews.title: Player does not walk no gps found it says
reviews.body: When i walk around the player does not walk around there he just stands there please help i really want too play this game

reviews.title: Be careful
reviews.body: Be Very careful 3 people got robbed of their cell phone and money from playing this game

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.body: 5 stars if they add pvp and trading like old games. Got a lot of bugs right now.

reviews.title: Did not work
reviews.body: If I turned it on after a bit it would take me back to the home screen

reviews.title: How about beta before one releases a crap game
reviews.body: Would be great if it worked

reviews.title: Good Game!
reviews.body: Great game to go out and do something instead of just sitting down and being lazy, but GPS system is a little funky and will lose your signal and pokemon near you.

reviews.title: Well of course
reviews.body: Pok√©mon GO is suppose to have bugs, duh! It just came out let The Pokemon Company Handle All these Bugs
Don't work or do anything at all
Awsome

reviews.title: Bugs
reviews.body: Don't get me wrong the game is good and gives me a reason to get out of the house but there are so many bugs. Every time I try to catch a Pokemon it freezes up. Now I can't even log in with my gmail. It won't load. Someone please fix it.

reviews.title: Great game, horrible playability.
reviews.body: Massive server connection issues and gameplay interruption. The game has become unplayable! Gameplay freezes after coming back from battery saver mode.

reviews.title: Must download
reviews.body: This is what Pokemon fans been waiting for since Pokemon came out. Just simply amazing. It would be nice to update there servers though which they will soon.

reviews.title: This game sucks d*ck
reviews.body: Apple and Steve Jobs paid pokemon go to make it work for their type phone but not for Samsung since it has so many bugs and it keeps constantly freezing at random times so f*ck u pokemon go and make your product better for Samsung phones

reviews.title: Good but lacks a TON
reviews.body: I have no pokestops around my area at all, you need to expand your coverage. The battle system is good but there are a lot of GLITCHES in battling and capturing pokemon. And the game would be so much better if you can just BATTLE WITH YOUR FRIENDS REGARDLESS of team color or gyms. Or maybe somehow tie these battles with friends to something like 1 pokecoin per victory just so there is more interaction with other pokemon go players.

reviews.title: Taking more space ok
reviews.body: Hopefully its downloads soon

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.body: Great game to get out and exercise with also seeing new "small town businesses". Hope they fix the AR camera for android or find a way around the compass. Still 5 stars though.

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.body: My dad and I both love getting outside and catching Pok√©mon. Yes, it does require a little cash to get good. But people can be expected to buy a $10 Google Play gift card if they don't have any money. Everyone around us when we are outside seems to be playing this game and I can understand why.
Has potential. But its omnipresent bugs make it largely unplayable.

I've uninstalled and re-installed this game twice and the game keeps freezing once you choose your character design. I'll give it one more go before giving up, but this has been a real disappointment so far.

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.body: I mean its a great game/concept but i just spent 20 min going to pokestops and when i got to each one nothing happend i would tap on them and it says a pokestop module can be installed. WTH is that !?! Its not in the store either!

reviews.title: Tablets?
reviews.body: I know this game is designed for smartphones,when I switched from my Note4 to my Tab E (both of them get service from Verizon) I can walk around spots Pok√©mon are hiding and I don't find any however when I switched back to my Note4 there's Pok√©mon everywhere.Please let tablets (with individual  data capabilites)  work cause my Tab's battery lasts a lot longer without portable battery charger.

reviews.title: Great Game. Needs work
reviews.body: It just came out recently, so obviously it needs work. The servers need time to be fixed. So stop bitching. All games are like this during the first month(s) of release.

reviews.title: Identity thieves
reviews.body: Anyone who signed up for Pok√©mon GO with a Google account unknowingly given Nintendo and developer Niantic (formerly owned by Google) full account access. That means they can see/edit/collect just about anything related to your Google account. Emails, photos, documents, all of your past location and search history: it can see all of this stuff. It's not worth it

reviews.title: Kinda Bumbed
reviews.body: Well i was excited about the game, then I downloaded it. It dosent work what so ever for me and I have installed it 4 times...I cant get past the create your person. Maybe one day....

reviews.title: You need a help section
reviews.body: I can't go to any of my pokestops because they are just too far away and I can't seem to be able to do anything else. I went to go find an faq to see if there was something I can be doing and there was nothing.

reviews.title: Won't find GPS
reviews.body: The app will not find my GPS signal, and my GPS is on and working, Google maps work just fine. And it will not let me sign into Pokemon club, please fix and I will change my rating to five stars

reviews.title: GYM GLITCH
reviews.body: It really takes away from the game when I can't take gyms anymore... enemy pokemon stay at 1hp and can't deal final blow just makes me force close app. PLEASE FIX.

reviews.title: I cant even properly install it (Nexus6)
reviews.body: The game app, or android, wont let me "allow" the game prerequisites (for example allowing the app to use my camara, gps, access edia storage, etc!). If I don't allow all of these the game will obviously be unplayable! Please do fix this~

reviews.title: ERROR PROBLEM
reviews.body: It seems like an cool game but I never played it so I guess. I should put 1 star until it's fixed I really want play it but it won't get fixed!üò∂

reviews.title: Servers ALWAYS DOWN
reviews.body: I live in Sudney Australia and everyone else is always able to play but my servers are always down. Each time I try again it gives me the same error message wtf?

reviews.title: Pretty fun
reviews.body: There are times that you have to log back into the game after closing it, times it doesn't load information of what's around you, doesn't load after the pokemon has been caught in the pokeball so you end up losing it, and no method of trading pokemon. Also not all pokemon are there (yes, for those of you who are jumping on the bandwagon and don't know anything about pokemon, there's more then 147, there's over 700) and hopefully with a future update they will start to show.

reviews.title: Server
reviews.body: When you continue to go on miles and miles of adventures... And you always have to stop because the damn server can't keep up with everything.... Fix server issues and stars will change

reviews.title: Game never worked
reviews.body: Kept getting GPS not found notification even though my location system works just fine. Couldn't get past the tutorial because it would let me choose the first creature

reviews.title: No pokemon + server failure
reviews.body: The server goes down to much and I can't find any pokemon where I go. Plus It won't let me connect and battle in the gym near me

reviews.title: Server Sucks
reviews.body: I just downloaded the hame started to play caught a few pokemon on my first try and now i cant get back on cause of the server.. Guess you guys aint prepare for the amount of people that was going to play.. I hope this issue is fix fast. If not dont expect 5 stars from anyone!!

reviews.title: It won't let me register
reviews.body: Just today at around 11:00am I downloaded the game.It says I have to register so I click the register button. It says to come back after an hour so like 1:30 later I come back to see if it works and it said the same thing. I was really looking forward to playing this gamesl.

reviews.title: Need more pokestops and gyms
reviews.body: There are 3 stops and 2 gyms in a 4km radius of my house thats where i walk. Dont live in the city and wont go to walk. Also just walked and eggs didn't go up at all. No pokemon are appearing near me

reviews.title: Why Are They In The Same Spot
reviews.body: I have an area near my house that when I go near it i catch like 10. Then I leave and come back again to more in the same spot? Its not a special place just the side of the road. Can you please explain this too me. It seems they just keep appearing in that spot every minute.

reviews.title: Server
reviews.body: The server situation has to be fixed also the arp is not working on my lg stylo 2 whicj is odd it did ot one time and then just stopped there are other improvements the game can make but I'm assuming those will be coming in further updates

reviews.title: Can't even play it
reviews.body: I can't play it because everytime I try to registrate it says something about try again in an hour and I tried to download it two time. The second time said the same thing. I can't even play it if I even wanted to.
